General.Name: Turkiye Is Bankasi
General.Description: Türkiye Is Bankasi A.S. provides various banking products and services. The company provides project finance, business and investment loans, deposit and cash management, credit card, check-bond, foreign trade transactions and financing, letters of guarantee and credit, forfaiting, foreign exchange trading, invoice collection, salary payment, investment account, tax collection, and other banking products. It also offers retail banking services, which includes deposits, consumer loans, overdraft accounts, credit cards, bill collections, money orders, foreign exchange purchases and sales, and safe deposit boxes. In addition, the company offers securities trading, money market transactions, spot and forward TL, and foreign exchange buying and selling, as well as derivative transactions, such as forward, swap, futures and options, syndication, securitization, etc. Further, it provides range of insurance and reinsurance activities including private pension, life/non-life insurance, and reinsurance transactions. Türkiye Is Bankasi A.S. was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
